translations: 鬈毛狗，贵妇犬；百依百顺的人，走狗

sentences.sentence: A magnificent Poodle appeared, walking on his hind legs just like a man.
sentences.translation: 一只华丽的鬈毛狗出现了，像人一样用后腿走路。

sentences.sentence: When she saw her friend Allison walking her little poodle, she would smile and say, "Hi, Allison!"
sentences.translation: 当杰西看到她的朋友艾莉森带着她的小狮子狗散步时，她总是微笑着打招呼：“艾莉森，你好！”

sentences.sentence: "We don't want a society", he said with a furrowed brow, "where you cannot go walking with your child or your poodle without risking an attack."
sentences.translation: “我们不想要一个这样的社会。”他皱着眉说，“在这里你根本无法保证与你的小孩或狮子狗散步时不受到攻击。”
